entries.text: （呼救） Oi! You there! Could you help us out, cully? You, yeah, you there! Stop pretending you can't see me! Why won't anyone look me in the eye? I-I'm not that ugly, am I?

（初见、自我介绍） Ow! What'd you go and do that for! Hm? Oh, yes, I remember. Some clod turned me into a tree. You were just breaking the spell, weren't you. Thank you. The name's Boc. I was pushed out of the cave. Told not to come back, not ever. Then I ended up as a tree. Lucky you came along, really.

（第二次对话） Oh, what a shame. When they threw me out of the cave, they took everything I owned, and so this is all I have to express my thanks. I hope you can forgive me. Or, if you can afford to wait for a while, I could sneak back into the cave, and bring back something of actual value. Then I'd be of some real use to you, I reckon.

（第三次对话） Right, but I'll need a moment. I-I'm frightened of them... So I have to gather myself. My knees start knockin'... just thinking about that god-awful cave on the shore...
（被攻击） Why'd you go and do that? It's because I'm ugly, isn't it? Now, you too, is it? The story of my rotten life... I never wanted this... Mum... Mum... I've... I've let you down...
